metadata.description: Official CNCF projects (graduated, incubating, and sandbox)

properties.docker_tags_url: Docker Hub or registry tags URL (requires manual curation)

notes: docker_tags_url field is empty and requires manual curation as this data is not in the CNCF CSV
All projects are open source with active GitHub repositories
Only includes official CNCF projects: graduated (32), incubating (39), and sandbox (164)
